bill_title: allow the executive director of the Board of Pardons and Paroles to delegate administrative decisions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow the executive director of the Board of Pardons and Paroles to delegate administrative decisions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 24-13-9 be amended to read as follows: 24-13-9. The secretary of corrections, after consulting with the Board of Pardons and Paroles, shall appoint an executive director for the Board of Pardons and Paroles to serve at the secretary's pleasure, who shall receive an annual salary fixed by the secretary. The executive director may delegate the duties and administrative functions required in this chapter and chapters 24-14, 24-15, 25-15A, and 24-16A to various staff members or committees consisting of staff members. However, any decision made by such a staff member or committee is subject to the final approval of the executive director. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
